subject: Pedals
description_text:
I ordered PLUS X-Silver-P3-H3-Plate from Amazon and it came without the base plate.
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Connor Lyon,  Could you please provide your order number? The silver base plate is currently out of stock at our overseas warehouse, but I will ask our operations team to handle it for you as soon as possible.
Hi Connor Lyon,  Hi, I am sorry for the inconvenience caused. It seems that our warehouse missed it. We will reship the plate to you from our US warehouse ASAP.

Thanks. How long will it take?
Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Connor Lyon,  We will send it to you by UPS or FedEx on Friday, and it is estimated to take 5-7 days to ship. This product won't arrive at the US warehouse until Friday
